Uses of Interface
ch.se.inf.ethz.jcd.batman.cli.Command

  • Packages that use Command 
    Package Description
    ch.se.inf.ethz.jcd.batman.cli
    Contains the Command Line Interface (CLI) classes.
    ch.se.inf.ethz.jcd.batman.cli.command
    This package contains classes representing Command Line Interface (CLI) commands used by CommandLine.

    • Uses of Command in ch.se.inf.ethz.jcd.batman.cli

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Command> CommandLineInterface.aliasCommandMapping 
      Methods in ch.se.inf.ethz.jcd.batman.cli with parameters of type Command 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void CommandLineInterface.attachCommand(Command command) 
      void CommandLine.attachCommand(Command command)
      Attaches the given command to the CLI.
      void CommandLineInterface.detachCommand(Command command) 
      void CommandLine.detachCommand(Command command)
      Removes the given command from the CLI.

    • Uses of Command in ch.se.inf.ethz.jcd.batman.cli.command

      Classes in ch.se.inf.ethz.jcd.batman.cli.command that implement Command 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ChangeDirectoryCommand
      Implements a change directory command to move around on the virtual disk.
      class  CopyCommand
      Implements a command to copy files around on the virtual disk.
      class  CreateCommand
      Provides a CLI command to create a new virtual disk.
      class  CreateDirectoryCommand
      Implements a create directory command for the CLI.
      class  DeleteCommand
      Implements a delete command for the CLI to delete members
      class  DestroyCommand
      Provides a CLI command to destroy a virtual disk
      class  ExportCommand
      Implements an export command that can be used to export a file on the virtual disk into a file on the host's disk.
      class  ImportCommand
      Implements an import command that can be used to import host files into the virtual disk.
      class  ListMembersCommand
      Implements a ls / dir like command for the CLI
      class  LoadCommand
      Provides a command to load a disk.
      class  MoveCommand
      Implements a move command that allows to move (and therefore rename) different members of a virtual disk.
      class  QueryCommand
      Implements a query command for the CLI.
      class  SizeCommand
      Implements a command to query the disk size of a file or directory.
      class  StopCommand
      Implements a quit command that can be used to end the CLI.
      class  UnloadCommand
      Provides a command to unload a loaded disk.
